decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing small, efficient creatures and cheap spells to control the board and apply pressure to the opponent quickly. By using cards like Spellstutter Sprite and faeries to counter opponent's spells, as well as cards like Vapor Snag to deal with threats, the deck aims to maintain tempo advantage. Cards like Delver of Secrets and Augur of Bolas provide additional pressure and card advantage. With a low mana curve and plenty of card draw/filtering, this deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver opponents in a Pauper 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on controlling the opponent's board with removal spells like Disfigure and Chainer's Edict, while also draining their life with cards like Gray Merchant of Asphodel and Tendrils of Corruption. Cuombajj Witches and Crypt Rats provide additional removal and board control, while Thorn of the Black Rose helps to generate card advantage. The inclusion of cards like Sign in Blood and Phyrexian Rager helps maintain card advantage and keep up the pressure. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily draining their life total.

This deck focuses on quickly building up a board of creatures like Augur of Bolas, Kiln Fiend, and Nivix Cyclops to deal damage to the opponent as fast as possible. The deck includes spells like Temur Battle Rage, Mutagenic Growth, and Apostle's Blessing to pump up the creatures and ensure they can get through blockers. There are also card draw spells like Compulsive Research and Gitaxian Probe to help maintain card advantage. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of aggressive creatures and direct damage spells.

The main concept of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing efficient removal spells like Victim of Night and Geth's Verdict, as well as hand disruption with cards like Wrench Mind and Chittering Rats, the deck aims to control the board while dealing consistent damage with creatures like Phyrexian Rager and Gray Merchant of Asphodel. The inclusion of card draw with Sign in Blood and utility creatures like Cuombajj Witches help keep the pressure on the opponent and maintain card advantage.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively build up a board presence with cheap creatures like Nivix Cyclops and Kiln Fiend, while using pump spells like Mutagenic Growth and Temur Battle Rage to deal massive damage in a single turn. The deck also includes card draw and selection spells like Preordain and Ponder to dig for key combo pieces. Additionally, protection spells like Apostle's Blessing and Spell Pierce help to protect your creatures from removal spells.

This Pauper 1 vs 1 aggro deck focuses on using spells like Lightning Bolt and Temur Battle Rage to pump up creatures like Nivix Cyclops and Kiln Fiend for quick damage. With cantrips like Ponder and Preordain, the deck aims to draw cards while keeping up pressure with aggressive creatures. Mutagenic Growth and Apostle's Blessing provide protection for key threats, while Gush helps with card advantage. The deck is designed to quickly overwhelm opponents with its efficient and explosive creatures, backed up by a solid suite of spells to support them.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive creatures and pumping them up with enchantments to deal damage efficiently. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and powerful board presence, powered by low-cost creatures and efficient spells. By combining creatures that are hard to block or remove with powerful pump spells, this deck aims to apply pressure early and force the opponent to react, ultimately leading to a quick victory through sheer aggression.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through counter spells, removal, and card advantage. It utilizes a mix of creature removal such as Doom Blade and Disfigure, counterspells like Counterspell and Prohibit, and card draw with Forbidden Alchemy and Mulldrifter. The deck also includes powerful creatures like Gurmag Angler and Augur of Bolas for win conditions. The mana base is built around Dimir lands for consistency. Overall, this Dimir Control deck aims to disrupt opponents' plans while establishing a dominant board presence.

The deck focuses on utilizing a variety of aura enchantments to power up creatures quickly and overwhelm opponents with aggressive attacks. By attaching powerful auras like Ethereal Armor, Armadillo Cloak, and Ancestral Mask to evasive creatures like Slippery Bogle and Silhana Ledgewalker, the deck aims to deal large amounts of damage in a short amount of time. The inclusion of cards like Heliod's Pilgrim and Gladecover Scout help to fetch additional auras, while cards like Utopia Sprawl and Abundant Growth provide ramp and fixing to ensure consistent plays.

The main focus of this Pauper Dimir Control deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan through a combination of removal spells, counter spells, and card advantage. By utilizing cards like Counterspell and Chainer's Edict, the deck aims to control the board and prevent the opponent from executing their strategy effectively. Additionally, the deck includes card draw engines like Mulldrifter and Sea Gate Oracle to ensure a steady stream of resources. Ultimately, the goal is to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent through careful decision-making and resource management.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using a combination of counterspells, removal spells, card draw, and powerful creatures. By using cards like Counterspell, Chainer's Edict, and Disfigure, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy and keep the board clear. Meanwhile, cards like Augur of Bolas and Mulldrifter help maintain card advantage and provide threats on the board. The mana base includes bounce lands like Dimir Aqueduct to ensure a steady supply of mana and consistency in casting spells.

The main concept of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to quickly deploy and control the board with efficient creatures and removal spells. The deck aims to apply pressure early on with aggressive creatures like Phyrexian Rager and Gray Merchant of Asphodel, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Duress and Chainer's Edict. Additionally, cards like Cuombajj Witches and Crypt Rats provide additional control options to maintain board presence while finishing off the opponent with powerful spells like Pestilence and Tendrils of Corruption.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggro strategies with cards like Delver of Secrets and Ninja of the Deep Hours. It also uses Faerie Miscreant and Spellstutter Sprite to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. With a mix of efficient removal spells like Skred and Lightning Bolt, along with card draw/filtering spells like Gush and Preordain, the deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent while maintaining card advantage. The inclusion of Counterspell and Dispel adds to the deck's ability to protect its key threats and disrupt the opponent's spells.

The deck focuses on aggressive play by utilizing efficient creatures like Glint Hawk and Seeker of the Way, backed up by burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast. It also includes card advantage and mana fixing through cards like Thraben Inspector and Prophetic Prism. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells such as Searing Blaze and Journey to Nowhere while pressuring the opponent's life total. The mana base includes artifact lands for additional synergy with Glint Hawk and Kor Skyfisher, improving the deck's overall consistency and power level.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board early with aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Faerie Miscreant, while also utilizing counterspells and bounce effects to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Ninja of the Deep Hours provides card advantage and pressure, while Ponder and Brainstorm help to filter through the deck and find key cards. The deck aims to establish an early advantage and then maintain it through a combination of tempo plays and efficient threats.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the Tireless Tribe card in conjunction with cards like Inside Out and Shadow Rift to create a powerful combo that allows for explosive plays and big swings in momentum. The deck also includes a mix of counterspells and card draw to control the board and maintain consistency. By efficiently cycling through the deck and protecting key combo pieces, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm opponents and secure victory.
